Megatron saw Firestrike's body enveloped in the explosion. Megatron
floated for a second, looking the area over, then turned his head
towards Prowl, all emotion gone from Megatron's face. His lips moved in
rythmic unison, giving the simple message. "Decepticons are under my
protection, Prowl, I sentence you to oblivion for destroying a superior
being." His eyes lit up in a demonic red fury, as he coldly and
collectivly held up his fusion cannon. A blast errupted from it, heading
towards Prowl, as it pushed Megatron backwards. He then whirled, and
fired several times towards the Maximal city, raining destruction upon
them, for the loss of what he hoped to be his bodyguard.

Soundwave however intercepted Switchblade's transmission, and recorded
it.
